channel.title: Dodian rights
channel.description: i jsut got a dodian server. i need to know the rights. i know 6 is owner but what is mod.

item.title: Dodian rights
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“lostandfound, post:6, topic:153133”][quote author=dragonchain link=topic=209403.msg1835931#msg1835931 date=1192955482]
Go into your characters files and double click on ur name and somthing like this should of showed up:

Chnage the rights to 3 to make yourself owner, some sources when you have 3 rights it doesn’t show your crown to you but it does to others either or go to the file data then admin.txt and put your name there

Thanks,

~Armo
[/quote]

Hey said dodian freaking stupid[/quote]

Look what I said dum dum.

Read full topic

@iatchi1019 wrote:

nvm i got it. i just needed to find out what mod was. i looked at the rights in client.java and the case number was the number of the right
